question: Question_03_(d)
statement:
Decide whether each of the following statement is true or false. You
need not give a reason. All matrices in this question are square
(\emph{n} x \emph{n}).

\textbf{(d)} If \emph{S} is any invertible matrix, then \emph{A} and
\emph{SAS\textsuperscript{-1}} have the same determinant.
